title: WTB: T205 Sovereign Archer, Bailey, or Ball
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Sovereign Archer, Bailey, or Ball
posts.post_content:
After Marc Del Percio found me an Austin, I've added Ball to my Top 3 "Gotta Have" list!  If anybody has a Sovereign back of any of these, let me know.  As a matter of fact, if you have a Ball I'd like to know anyway, since I haven't seen one and would like to confirm it...

Take Care,
Geno

It's been almost a month, so I thought I'd rebait the hook and throw it back in the water...

Take Care,
Geno

JP,

'89 Billy Ripken -- haha that brings back memories :)

Anybody?  I've got a Biff Pocoroba card around here just lookin' for a new home in trade...

Take Care,
Geno

Let me know if you have one to sell or trade...I'm still looking!

Take Care,
Geno
